authors.name: Xian Adiconis
authors.affiliation: Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard

authors.name: Joshua Z Levin
authors.affiliation: Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ejm3o","text":"This protocol is based on the published Rolling Circle to Concatemeric Consensus (R2C2) method (1). The aim is to make elongated cDNA via rolling circle amplification using cDNA generated from the 10x Chromium 3' (or 5') single-cell RNA-seq assay to increase the accuracy of downstream sequencing on an Oxford Nanopore Technologies sequencing platform. The major modification from the original protocol is to add an additional cDNA re-amplification step (see section \"10x cDNA re-amplification\") to enrich for fragments with the proper sequence (poly(T) at 3' and TSO at 5') at both ends, which is essential in circularization with the 10x Splint fragment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: R2C2, single cell RNA-seq, ONT,long-read sequencing
manuscript_citation: {"blocks":[{"key":"5pt8o","text":"Simmons SK, Adiconis X, Haywood N, Parker J, Lin Z, Liao Z, Tuncali I, Al'Khafaji AM, Shin A, Jagadeesh K, Gosik K, Gatzen M, Smith JT, El Kodsi DN, Kuras Y, Baecher-Allan C, Serrano GE, Beach TG, Garimella K, Rozenblatt-Rosen O, Regev A, Dong X, Scherzer CR, Levin JZ. Experimental and Computational Methods for Allelic Imbalance Analysis from Single-Nucleus RNA-seq Data. bioRxiv [Preprint]. 2024 Aug 16:2024.08.13.607784. doi: 10.1101/2024.08.13.607784. PMID: 39185246; PMCID: PMC11343128.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"87gve","text":"Cleanup with Select-a-Size columns (Zymo) and a size cut-off of ~125 bp. Follow the Select-a-Size cleanup protocol for single-size selection, but in the buffer preparation add   of 100% ethanol to   of Select-a-Size DNA binding buffer. Elute in   DNA elution buffer (from the kit). QC with 1/5x dilution for Quant-it (Thermo Fisher Scientific) and 1/50x dilution for BioAnalyzer DNA HS assay (Agilent).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":176,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":197,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":245,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"31cmt","text":"Label this product as \"10x Splint\", store at   for later use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"82g97","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"85","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}
